name: core (itch)
description:
You are your worst enemy in this hectic, retro-style arcade anti-shooter made for the #lowrezjam. Avoid your own steady stream of bullets while collecting core stabilizers to earn points. Every five stabilizers collected will rebuild your shield but will it be enough to survive? Not likely...Controls:
Arrow keys to change direction
'Esc' to quit
'F' to toggle full screen mode
Available to play on GameJolt
* Linux build is unfortunately untested.
